about.title: About me
about.summary: Hi, my name is Edwin Moradian. I'm a developer with a background in physics. I love programming, traveling, and making a difference where I can. In the last three years, I've primarily focused in the web development space and have worked with many diverse teams remotely from all parts of the globe. Currently, I am stationed in Yerevan, Armenia where I have undertaken new philanthropic goals. If you need a project built or have a job opportunity, please contact me or check out some of my work.
